languages.text: "Что ты творишь, элантах? Мой народ — не я, они не поймут, не простят мон-кай за подобное!" {n}Ирлиэт сторонится вас, словно безумного псайкера.{/n} "Ты только что провел{mf||а} черту между нами, {name}. Прости, но я останусь по другую сторону".

traits.locale_text: "Что ты творишь, элантах? Мой народ — не я, они не поймут, не простят мон-кай за подобное!" {n}Ирлиэт отпрянывает от вас, словно от безумного псайкера.{/n} "Ты только что провел{mf||а} черту между нами, {name}. Прости, но я останусь по другую сторону".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "What are you doing, elantach? My people are not as lenient as I am, they will not understand or forgive!" {n}Yrliet backs away from you as if from a deranged psyker.{/n} "You have just drawn a line between us, {name}. Forgive me, but I will stay on the other side."
languages.original_text: "Что ты творишь, элантах? Мой народ — не я, они не поймут, не простят мон-кай за подобное!" {n}Ирлиэт сторонится вас, словно безумного псайкера.{/n} "Ты только что провел{mf||а} черту между нами, {name}. Прости, но я останусь по другую сторону".

traits.locale_text: "What are you doing, elantach? My people are not as lenient as I am, they will not understand or forgive the mon-keigh for a transgression!" {n}Yrliet backs away from you like from a deranged psyker.{/n} "You have just drawn a line between us, {name}. Forgive me, but I will stay on the other side."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What are you doing, elantach? My people are not as lenient as I am, they will not understand or forgive the mon-keigh for a transgression!" {n}Yrliet backs away from you like from a deranged psyker.{/n} "You have just drawn a line between us, {name}. Forgive me, but I will stay on the other side."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What are you doing, elantach? My people are not as lenient as I am, they will not understand or forgive the mon-keigh for a transgression!" {n}Yrliet backs away from you like from a deranged psyker.{/n} "You have just drawn a line between us, {name}. Forgive me, but I will stay on the other side."

Forgive me, but I will stay on the other side."

traits.locale_text: "What are you doing, elantach? My people are not as lenient as I am, they will not understand or forgive!" {n}Yrliet backs away from you as if from a deranged psyker.{/n} "You have just drawn a line between us, {name}. Forgive me, but I will stay on the other side."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What are you doing, elantach? My people are not as lenient as I am, they will not understand or forgive!" {n}Yrliet backs away from you as if from a deranged psyker.{/n} "You have just drawn a line between us, {name}. Forgive me, but I will stay on the other side."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué haces, elantach? ¡Los míos no son tan benévolos como yo, ellos no entenderán ni perdonarán semejante afrenta!». {n}Yrliet retrocede como si fueras {mf|un psíquico desbocado|una psíquica desbocada}.{/n} «Acabas de trazar una línea entre nosotros, {name}. Perdóname, pero pienso quedarme al otro lado».
languages.original_text: "What are you doing, elantach? My people are not as lenient as I am, they will not understand or forgive!" {n}Yrliet backs away from you as if from a deranged psyker.{/n} "You have just drawn a line between us, {name}. Forgive me, but I will stay on the other side."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué haces, elantach? ¡Mi gente no es tan benévola como yo, ellos no entenderán ni perdonarán a los mon-keigh por semejante afrenta!». {n}Yrliet retrocede como si fueras {mf|un psíquico desbocado|una psíquica desbocada}.{/n} «Acabas de trazar una línea entre nosotros, {name}. Perdóname, pero pienso quedarme al otro lado».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你到底在干什么啊，外界人？我的族人可不像我这么宽容，他们不会理解你，也不会原谅你！”{n}伊莉耶特从你身边逃开，就像远离失控的灵能者一样。{/n}“你已经在我们之间画了一条界限，{name}。请原谅我，但我必须留在另一边。”
languages.original_text: "What are you doing, elantach? My people are not as lenient as I am, they will not understand or forgive!" {n}Yrliet backs away from you as if from a deranged psyker.{/n} "You have just drawn a line between us, {name}. Forgive me, but I will stay on the other side."

traits.locale_text: “你到底在干什么啊，外界人？我的族人可不像我这么宽容，他们绝不会理解猴子的罪过，也绝不会原谅！”{n}伊莉耶特从你身边逃开，就像远离失控的灵能者一样。{/n}“你已经在我们之间画了一条界限，{name}。请原谅我，但我必须留在另一边。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Que faites-vous, elantach ? Mes semblables ne sont pas aussi indulgents que moi, ils ne comprendront ni ne pardonneront tolèreront un tel écart ! » {n}Yrliet s'éloigne de vous comme si vous étiez {mf|un psyker dérangé|une psyker dérangée}.{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|allé|allée} trop loin, {name}. Pardonnez-moi, mais je ne veux plus rester à vos côtés. »
languages.original_text: "What are you doing, elantach? My people are not as lenient as I am, they will not understand or forgive!" {n}Yrliet backs away from you as if from a deranged psyker.{/n} "You have just drawn a line between us, {name}. Forgive me, but I will stay on the other side."

traits.locale_text: « Que faites-vous, elantach ? Mes semblables ne sont pas aussi indulgents que moi, ils ne comprendront ni ne tolèreront une telle transgression de la part des mon-keigh ! » {n}Yrliet s'éloigne de vous comme si vous étiez {mf|un psyker dérangé|une psyker dérangée}.{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|allé|allée} trop loin, {name}. Pardonnez-moi, mais je ne veux plus rester à vos côtés. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「何をするつもりだ、エランタ？我が民は我ほど甘くないぞ！彼らは罪を理解しないし、許しもしない！」{n}ユリエットは、まるで錯乱した異能者のように、あなたから離れる。{/n}「あなたは我々の間に一線を引いたんだ、{name}。許してくれ。だが、我はあなたとは違う側にいるのだ」
languages.original_text: "What are you doing, elantach? My people are not as lenient as I am, they will not understand or forgive!" {n}Yrliet backs away from you as if from a deranged psyker.{/n} "You have just drawn a line between us, {name}. Forgive me, but I will stay on the other side."

traits.locale_text: 「何をするつもりだ、エランタ？我が民は我ほど甘くないぞ！彼らは罪を理解しないし、許しもしない！」{n}ユリエットは、まるで錯乱した異能者のように、あなたから離れる。{/n}「あなたは我々の間に一線を引いたんだ、{name}。許してくれ。だが、我はあなたとは違う側にいるのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Was tut Ihr denn, Elantach? Mein Volk ist weniger gnädig als ich, sie werden es nicht verstehen und nicht verzeihen!" {n}Yrliet weicht von dir zurück wie eine wahnsinnige Psionikerin.{/n} "Ihr habt soeben eine Grenze zwischen uns gezogen, {name}. Vergebt mir, doch ich werde auf der anderen Seite bleiben."
languages.original_text: "What are you doing, elantach? My people are not as lenient as I am, they will not understand or forgive!" {n}Yrliet backs away from you as if from a deranged psyker.{/n} "You have just drawn a line between us, {name}. Forgive me, but I will stay on the other side."

traits.locale_text: "Was tut Ihr denn, Elantach? Mein Volk ist weniger gnädig als ich, sie werden es nicht verstehen und einem Chem-Pan-Sey nicht verzeihen!" {n}Yrliet weicht von dir zurück wie eine wahnsinnige Psionikerin.{/n} "Ihr habt soeben eine Grenze zwischen uns gezogen, {name}. Vergebt mir, doch ich werde auf der anderen Seite bleiben."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ne yapıyorsun elantach? Halkım, benim kadar hoşgörülü değildir. Bunu ne anlarlar ne de affederler!" {n}Yrliet, aklı karışmış bir ruhsezermişsin gibi senden uzaklaşıyor.{/n} "Aramıza bir sınır çizdin {name}. Beni affet, ben sınırın diğer tarafında kalacağım."
languages.original_text: "What are you doing, elantach? My people are not as lenient as I am, they will not understand or forgive!" {n}Yrliet backs away from you as if from a deranged psyker.{/n} "You have just drawn a line between us, {name}. Forgive me, but I will stay on the other side."

traits.locale_text: "Ne yapıyorsun elantach? Halkım, benim kadar hoşgörülü değildir. Bunu ne anlarlar ne de affederler!" {n}Yrliet, senden aklı karışmış bir ruhsezermişsin gibi uzaklaşıyor.{/n} "Aramıza bir sınır çizdin {name}. "Beni affet, ben sınırın diğer tarafında kalacağım."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
